query:
SELECT 
            COALESCE(SUM(m.data_size), 0) as "data_size!",
            COALESCE(SUM(m.metadata_size), 0) as "metadata_size!"
        FROM 
            metadata m
        INNER JOIN 
            buckets b ON b.id = m.bucket_id
        WHERE 
            b.account_id = $1 AND m.state IN ('current', 'pending');
